synopsis.p: Train a model that predict an Alvis relation with TEES Trainer

description.p: executes the TEES training on and record the results in . Param sets the name of the binary relation to predict. and set the two roles of the relation. Params , and give respectively the features key of the train, dev and test corpus.

param-doc.name: namedEntityLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing the named entities

param-doc.name: neFeatureName
param-doc.p: Name of the feature to access the type of the named entities

param-doc.name: relationName
param-doc.p: Name of the relation to predict.

param-doc.name: relationRole1
param-doc.p: First role of the relation to predict

param-doc.name: relationRole2
param-doc.p: First role of the relation to predict

param-doc.name: trainSetFeature
param-doc.p: Feature key of the train set corpus.

param-doc.name: devSetFeature
param-doc.p: Feature key of the dev set corpus.

param-doc.name: testSetFeature
param-doc.p: Feature key of the test set corpus.

param-doc.name: modelTargetDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory where to put the trained model

param-doc.name: modelName
param-doc.p: Give a name to the trained model

param-doc.name: omitSteps
param-doc.p: Set the preprocessing steps to omit in the form of [SPLIT-SENTENCES][,NER][,PARSE][,FIND-HEADS]
